content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. It's always a good idea to double-check the recipe before starting to cook, just to make sure you have everything you need and to avoid any surprises along the way.

I think you'll do great with the recipe from your cookbook. Since you've been enjoying the cookbook so far, it's likely that the green curry recipe will turn out delicious. And if you do happen to have any questions or need any clarification, don't hesitate to reach out.

Remember to have fun and be creative in the kitchen! Cooking is all about experimentation and trying new things, so don't be afraid to add your own twist to the recipe or try out new ingredients.

Good luck and happy cooking! I hope your green curry turns out amazing and that you enjoy every bite.
